text:
@realDonaldTrump Sigh...
We have a high mortality rate from systemic racism, poverty, militarization, and environmental pollution.
All this has been exacerbated by #impotus 
On top of this we have COVID-19 killing us by the thousands daily.
#protests2020
#ONEV1
#VoteBlueToSaveAmerica https://t.co/LjphfnORpY
